mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.farm.mapper.farmerInfoMapper.selectfarmerInfo */ CM.FRMER_SN , CM.BZOB_RGNO , CM.MNGER_RELATE , CM.BZM_CORP_NM , CM.ADDR , CM.RRSD_ADDR , CM.RDNM_ADDR , CM.TW_NM , CM.PER_CORP_DVCD_NM , CM.NAFO_DVCD_NM , CM.TELNO , CM.MBL_TELNO , CM.FAX_TELNO , CM.EMAIL_ADDR , CM.FAMG_STR_YMD , CM.FARMNG_BEGIN_STLE_CD_NM , CM.FARMNG_ENGAGE_STLE_CD_NM , CM.FNDT_YR , CM.BZM_RGNO , CM.REPR_NM , CM.REPR_ADDR , CM.BRTHDY , CM.SEXDSTN , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_FARMER_INFO CM WHERE 1=1

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.farm.mapper.farmerInfoMapper.selectfarmerInfoList */ CM.FRMER_SN , CM.BZOB_RGNO , CM.MNGER_RELATE , CM.BZM_CORP_NM , CM.ADDR , CM.RRSD_ADDR , CM.RDNM_ADDR , CM.TW_NM , CM.PER_CORP_DVCD_NM , CM.NAFO_DVCD_NM , CM.TELNO , CM.MBL_TELNO , CM.FAX_TELNO , CM.EMAIL_ADDR , CM.FAMG_STR_YMD , CM.FARMNG_BEGIN_STLE_CD_NM , CM.FARMNG_ENGAGE_STLE_CD_NM , CM.FNDT_YR , CM.BZM_RGNO , CM.REPR_NM , CM.REPR_ADDR , CM.BRTHDY , CM.SEXDSTN , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID , CM.DEL_YN FROM TB_FARMER_INFO CM WHERE 1=1
